alert.note: Alert for Estill; Lee; Menifee; Powell; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 10:46AM EDT until May 07 at 11:15AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Powell County in east central Kentucky... Estill County in east central Kentucky... South central Menifee County in east central Kentucky... North central Lee County in southeastern Kentucky... Northwestern Wolfe County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 1115 AM EDT. * At 1046 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Westbend to Harris Ferry to near Richmond, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Clay City around 1050 AM EDT. Stanton around 1055 AM EDT. Irvine around 1100 AM EDT. Lombard around 1105 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Red River Gorge, Ravenna and Shade. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
